title: Material Cost Integration
description: Allow users to estimate material usage per booking and charge based on owner-defined cost per gram.

title: Review System
description: Allow users to leave reviews and ratings for completed bookings. Ratings should be visible on the printer listing.

title: Owner Earnings Dashboard
description: Show a breakdown of total earnings for owners, with charts grouped by booking, printer, or month.

title: Printer Tags & Filtering
description: Let owners add tags to their printers (e.g. PLA, high-speed, multi-color) and allow users to filter results by tag.

title: Listing Cap & Paid Tiers
description: Introduce a free listing cap (e.g. 2 printers) for owners, with paid subscription tiers to unlock more. Enforce cap in UI and database, and allow tier-based upgrades later via Stripe or Supabase roles.
